```{r setup, include=FALSE}
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

```{r initial data tidying, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
RIO_AX_raw <- read_csv("data/RIO.AX.csv", col_types = cols(Date = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"))) #importing the data 
RIO_AX_2021 <- RIO_AX_raw %>% filter(Open != "null", Date >= "2021-01-01") #selecting only the 2021 rows
View(RIO_AX_2021)
```

```{r first graph}
plot(x=RIO_AX_2021$Date, y=RIO_AX_2021$Open)
```
